name: Base Miles #1
description:
Low-intensity Base Miles is a great way to build fitness. The effort is low enough that we can complete moderate duration frequently. To improve your response to this type of training, we also focus on your cadence. 



Today, we perform a long, steady base ride with varying cadence to improve your training response.
